original_text: These people who trusted God were too good for this world. Some of them had to travel about in the wilderness and on the hills. Some had to live in holes in the rocks and in the ground.
korean_text: (이런 사람은 세상이 감당하지 못하느니라) 그들이 광야와 산과 동굴과 토굴에 유리하였느니라

sentences.original_text: were too good for this world
Some of them had to travel about
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 일부는 이리저리 다녀야 했고

sentences.original_text: in the wilderness and on the hills
Some had to live in holes
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 이들은 구멍 속에서 살아야 했고

sentences.original_text: in the rocks and in the ground
sentences.korean_translation: 바위와 땅속에 있는 구멍에서 살아야 했습니다
